summary: This mod adds a pair of magic Breton twins; Lysander & Queenie Gaersly to the Frostfruit Inn in Rorikstead.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Magical Breton Twins, Lysander & Queenie[/size][/color][/font]



[size=4]This mod adds a pair of magic Breton twins; Lysander & Queenie Gaersly to the Frostfruit Inn in Rorikstead.[/size]

[size=4]Each twin comes equipped with an Expert set of college robes and a wide array of spells (Queenie focuses on restoration & defense/Lysander uses offense & destruction). 

[/size][i][size=4]1.4 UPDATE the Twins are now completely standalone (asides from the requisite DLC), and their files are now conveniently packaged into .bsa format. Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested![/size][/i]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps) [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Uniquely enchanted armor[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Times New Roman][size=4][color=#ffffff]
Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. [/color]
[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to 

[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies[/url]﻿ & Stealthic for KS Hairdo's Renewal [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]LogRaam[/url]﻿ for The Eyes of Beauty [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Recommended Mods[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better Males[/url]﻿ by Chris 57 [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/]Better Females[/url]﻿ by Bella[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70]Nude Females[/url]﻿ by Thepal[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Facelight[/url]﻿ by Tktk1[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul[/url]﻿ by Cloudedtruth [/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang

files.name: Lysander and Queenie Magic Twins
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the twins' Hearthfire Housecarl & Steward faction numbers so they SHOULDN'T already think they work for you
Gave the twins unique mage armor so they don't look like every other wizard in Skyrim
Beefed up the twins' spell repertoire and gave them some better spells

files.name: Lysander and Queenie Magic Twins
files.changelogHtml:
Packed all necessary files into .bsa
Made mod entirely standalone
